page.title: 16CONCERNS - YOUTH, SALTCOATS
page.content: The biggest worry for young people in Saltcoats is the fear of{unemployment when they leave school. Many kids complain that they have no facilities to enjoy their leisure time - they are{bored. The combination of unemployment and boredom leads to{social problems:}a tiny minority sniff{glue and solvents and there has been an increase in the abuse of{drugs,}although by far the greatest form of "escape" is{alcohol. There is a lot of under-age drinking. Other young people express their discontent by{defacing}buildings, {smashing}phone boxes and bus shelters and{"giving themselves a mention"}in spray paint.
